visualDijkstra

Class Shortest

  • java.lang.Object
    • visualDijkstra.Shortest

  • public class Shortest
extends java.lang.Object

    Shortest figures out the shortest path through the graph generated, using Dijkstra's algorithm, and edits the .dot file to color the path. Below is a graph created after doing an amortized analysis of Dijkstra's algorithm.

      Constructor and Description
      Shortest()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void path(int s, int t)
      Figures out the shortest path through the graph from the vertices you give it.

    • Method Detail

      • path

        public static void path(int s,
        int t)
        Figures out the shortest path through the graph from the vertices you give it. Creates a .dot file from the .txt file generated from the Generator and then edits it to display the shortest path.
        Parameters:
        s - vertex you want to begin at
        t - vertex you want to end up at
